price: ߒ ߞߊ߲߫ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߝߍ߬ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
